Posts.Content: Badasscrybaby wrote: I was just diagnosed with stage IV IDC with lung mets. First time and it is so advanced. Need to have an MRI to see if it's in the brain. I fear it is. Need to hear of any survivor stories. Thank you! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Need to hear positive stories for stage 4 diagnose Badasscrybaby Erika37
